name: Echo HTTP requests
description: Web Server Application to echo HTTP request information.

ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio account Sid. You view it here: https://console.twilio.com

CHAT_SERVICE_SID.description: Chat service SID. You can create it here: https://www.twilio.com/console/chat/dashboard

CHAT_API_KEY.description: API Keys are revokable credentials for the Twilio API. You can create it here: https://www.twilio.com/console/chat/runtime/api-keys

CHAT_API_KEY_SECRET.description: API Keys are revokable credentials for the Twilio API.
